1: @@//brgya byin mer ni me lha gshin rje bden bral nub phyogs su ni gshin rje srin po chu // rlung dang nor sbyin 'phrog byed phyogs su rlung dang gnod sbyin drag po steng gi cha dang
2: 'og tu yang // tshangs dang khyab 'jug mtshon ldan 'khor gyi skye bo dang bcas rang rang phyogs mi bsrung zhing skyod ba ste // de dag dbus su dus kyi 'khor lo rgyal pa mchog gi skyed mdzad
3: gzhom du med pa rdo rje 'i sku / 21 / lhun po'i rgyab kyi phyogs rnams su ni sa gzhi dag la lha min rnams kyis rgyal bar dka' ba 'khor // gang du chos ni rnam par nyams shing rtsod dus 'jug ba
4: de dang der ni rab tu bgrod par byed // kla klo rnams kyang g.yul du bcom ste rang gi chos la dgod pa byas nas mdun du rnam par rgyu // rdzogs ldan gsum ldan gnyis ldan dag dang rtsod dus
5: gzhan ni dus kyi sbyor ba dag gis 'byung bar 'gyur / 22 / dum bu gang du stobs ldan 'khor lo can de rab tu zhugs ba dar ni rdzogs ldan dus bgrod de // rgyal po'i rgyab tu gsum ldan
6: rtsod pa'i dus kyang mdun dag tu ste gnyis kyi bar du gnyis ldan no // dus rnams dag gi lo yi tshad ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig ro brgya dag dang bcas ba ste // re re dag gi tshad ni dus dang
7: mda' yis bsgyur ba'i mi rnams dag gi lo brgya gang yin pa'o // 23 / phra dbugs dhru dang chu tshod nyin zhag dhru dang dus bzhi dag ni stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang // drug brgya rnams ni rim pas
8: lus skyes phra dang mi dang 'byung po lha dang lha min rnams dang ni // nus dang gtso bo'i nyin zhag gcig gi tshad des gzhi dag ldus bzhi nus ba'i tshad du 'jug / dum bu dum bur zhi ba'i go 'phang
